Returns: The insets supplied, minus any insets that were consumed
Parameters: View: The view applying window insets
onApplyWindowInsets(android.view.View,an.Description: When @B_android#view#View#setOnApplyWindowInsetsListener_E@ on a View, this listener method will be called instead of the view's own @B_android#view#View#onApplyWindowInsets_E@ method.
onApplyWindowInsets(android.view.View,an.FullName: public abstract WindowInsets onApplyWindowInsets (View v, WindowInsets insets)

ClassDesc: Listener for applying window insets on a view in a custom way. Apps may choose to implement this interface if they want to apply custom policy to the way that window insets are treated for a view. If an OnApplyWindowInsetsListener is set, its @B_android#view#View#OnApplyWindowInsetsListener#onApplyWindowInsets_E@ method will be called instead of the View's own @B_android#view#View#onApplyWindowInsets_E@ method. The listener may optionally call the parameter View's onApplyWindowInsets method to apply the View's normal behavior as part of its own.
